name: Mekong Delta Tour - Free Tour Guide
description:
West River with inherent natural beauty and islet, this is an interesting destination for those who want to experience the idyllic rural
place. Should not miss to mention Mekong Detal, where is like "basket"
of southern fruit, a destination with many unique cultural values of hick.
Through the Mekong Delta tour, visitors can not only feel the unique features of
the Mekong Delta, but also experience the idyllic beauty of nature, people and
life here.
